title: Dinnerbone: 今日将会发布另一1.8.1预览版
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
Dinnerbone: 
There may be another small pre-release today to fix some remaining issues, and then we'll look at a release date for 1.8.1.
Dinnerbone: 
今天应该会有另外一个小规模的预发布版以修复剩下的一些小问题，然后我们就可以决定1.8.1正式版的发布日期了。

replies.txt_content: = =还要多久
